name: Dice Gatherer - COMP2007
description:
Welcome to DiceVille.

You have stumbled into the quiet village of DiceVille. To welcome you into their village, the residents have prepared a treasure hunt to collect dice blocks before the timer runs out.

If you collect all of the dice blocks, you'll get the best score possible

How To Play

WSAD or Arrow Keys: moves your character

Left Click - confirms selection (Menus Only)

Link to GitHub Repo: mblenkhorn/COMP2007-Assignment (github.com)
